Symbol.Script_3D:
unid = 1
for i=1 to 2 hotspot 0, 0, 0, unid, A, 1+256 : unid = unid + 1 hotspot A, 0, 0, unid, A, 2 : unid = unid + 1 hotspot -1, 0, 0, unid, A, 3 : unid = unid + 1 addz ZZYZX next i del 2
for i=1 to 2 hotspot 0, 0, 0, unid, ZZYZX, 1+256 : unid = unid + 1 hotspot 0, 0, ZZYZX, unid, ZZYZX, 2 : unid = unid + 1 hotspot 0, 0, -1, unid, ZZYZX, 3 : unid = unid + 1
hotspot 0, 0, 0, unid, trimbot, 1+128 : unid = unid + 1 hotspot 0, 0, -trimbot, unid, trimbot, 2 : unid = unid + 1 hotspot 0, 0, 1, unid, trimbot, 3 : unid = unid + 1 addx A next i del 2
rotx 90
if debug then model wire prism 4, trimt, 0, 0, A, 0, A, ZZYZX-y0, 0, ZZYZX model solid endif
material materialAttribute_1
addx trimoffs prism 4, trimt, 0, -trimbot, 0, y1-ys, -trimw, y1, -trimw, -trimbot gosub "coororigin2"
model wire !!!каркасный чтобы не сливалось prism 4, trimt, 0, -trimbot, 0, y1-ys, -trimw, y1, -trimw, -trimbot addx aa prism 4, trimt, 0, -trimbot, 0, y2+ys, trimw, y2, trimw, -trimbot model solid !!!
prism 4, trimt, 0, -trimbot, 0, y2+ys, trimw, y2, trimw, -trimbot gosub "coororigin2" del 2
addx trimoffs
if bottrimw>eps then addy -bottrimw block aa, bottrimw, trimt gosub "coororigin1" del 1 endif
if toptrimw>eps then prism 4, trimt, 0, y1-ys-yt, 0, y1-ys, aa, y2+ys, aa, y2+ys-yt gosub "coororigin1" endif
if beamw>eps then prism 4, beamt, -trimw, y1+yb, -trimw, y1, aa+trimw, y2, aa+trimw, y2+yb gosub "coororigin1" endif
if panelt>eps and trimbot>eps then material materialAttribute_2 addy -trimbot block aa, trimbot-bottrimw, panelt del 1 base orx=rnd(2) coor{3} 2, 4, orx, -bottrimw, 0, orx+1, -bottrimw, 0, orx, 1-bottrimw, 0, orx, -bottrimw, 1 body 1 endif
end
"coororigin1": base orx=rnd(2) ory=rnd(2) orz=rnd(2) coor{3} 2, 4, orx, ory, orz, orx+1, ory, orz, orx, ory+1, orz, orx, ory, orz+1 body 1 return
"coororigin2": base orx=rnd(2) ory=rnd(2) orz=rnd(2) coor{3} 2, 4, orx, ory, orz, orx, ory+1, orz, orx+1, ory, orz, orx, ory, orz+1 body 1 return
Symbol.Script_2D:
if GLOB_VIEW_TYPE<>9 then unid=1 hotspot2 A/2, 0, unid : unid = unid + 1
hotspot2 0, 0, unid, A, 1+256 : unid = unid + 1 hotspot2 A, 0, unid, A, 2 : unid = unid + 1 hotspot2 -1, 0, unid, A, 3 : unid = unid + 1
fill SYMB_FILL pen SYMB_SECT_PEN add2 A/2, 0 for i=1 to 2 add2 aa/2, 0 hotspot2 trimw, -B, unid : unid = unid + 1 poly2_b 4, 7, SYMB_FILL_PEN, SYMB_FBGD_PEN, 0, 0, 1, trimw, 0, 1, trimw, -B, 1, 0, -B, 1 del 1 mul2 -1, 1 next i del 3 else
! if SYMB_MIRRORED then mul2 -1, 1 project2 4, 270, 19
ptm=GLOB_SCALE/1000 define style "dimtxt" fonttype, fontsize, 8, 0 style "dimtxt" ar=fontsize*ptm*0.7 add2 trimoffs, 0
tw=-fontsize*ptm*3 zw=-ar
!!!!!!!aa!!!!!!! add2 0, -trimbot xx=aa gosub "graphdim"
!!!!!trimw!!!!!! if trimw>eps then xx=trimw txtoffs=-1 add2 -trimw, 0 gosub "graphdim" del 1 txtoffs=1 add2 aa, 0 gosub "graphdim" del 1 endif del 1
txtoffs=0 !!!!!высота справа!!!!!! rot2 90 xx=y2+trimbot+yb add2 -trimbot, -aa-trimw gosub "graphdim" del 2
tw=fontsize*ptm*2 zw=ar
!!!!!!!!ширина!!!!!!!! xx=(aa+trimw*2)/cos(trang) add2 -trimw, y1+beamw rot2 -trang gosub "graphdim"
rot2 90 add2 -beamw, 0 !!!!!!!!!beamw!!!!!!!!!! if beamw>eps then txtoffs=1 xx=beamw gosub "graphdim" endif
!!!!!!!toptrimw!!!!!!!! if toptrimw>eps then txtoffs=-1 xx=toptrimw add2 -toptrimw, 0 gosub "graphdim" del 1 endif
txtoffs=0
del 4 !!!!!!!!!!zz!!!!!!!!!!! xx=y1-yt add2 -trimw, 0 rot2 90 gosub "graphdim" del 2
rot2 90 add2 0, trimw if trimbot>bottrimw then xx=trimbot-bottrimw add2 -trimbot, 0 gosub "graphdim" del 1 endif if bottrimw>eps then xx=bottrimw add2 -bottrimw, 0 gosub "graphdim" del 1 endif
endif
end
"graphdim": offsx=0 offsy=0 stxt=str(xx*1000,1,0) if stw(stxt)*ptm>xx then if abs(txtoffs)<eps then offsy=ar else offsx=(xx+stw(stxt)*ptm*1.3)/2*txtoffs endif endif text2 xx/2+offsx, tw+offsy, str(xx*1000,1,0) line2 0,tw, xx, tw for i=1 to 2 line2 0,zw, 0, tw+zw line2 0,tw, ar, tw+ar/4 line2 0,tw, ar, tw-ar/4 add2 xx, 0 mul2 -1, 1 next i del 4 return
!"graphdim": ! !return
Symbol.Script_1D:
eps=0.0001 aa=A-trimoffs*2 !!! ширина просвета zz=ZZYZX-trimoffs !!! высота просвета
y0=A*tan(trang) y01=(toptrimw-trimoffs)/cos(trang) y02=(trimw-trimoffs)*tan(trang) y1=ZZYZX+y01+y02 !!! левая ключевая точка y2=ZZYZX-y0+y01-y02 !!! правая ключевая точка (зависит от угла) ys=trimw*tan(trang) !!! перепад точек по верху боковин yt=toptrimw/cos(trang) !!! высота toptrim yb=beamw/cos(trang) !!! высота beam
Symbol.Script_VL:
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME="trimt" then parameters B=trimt else parameters trimt=B endif
values "trimbot" range[bottrimw,)
